00033 proc::proc(string plugin_id,
00034                    map<string,string> properties)
00035 {
00036     // Customize if needed
00037     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00038         throw runtime_error("proc plugin could not be initialized");
00039     
00040 }

00047 proc::~proc()
00048 {
00049     // Customize if needed
00050     sigar_close(sig_);
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00060 bool proc::initialize_plugin(map<string,string> properties) 
00061 {
00062     // Customize if needed
00063     sigar_open(&sig_);
00064 
00065     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00066     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00067     
00068     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00069     
00070     return true;
00071 }

00085 bool proc::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00086                                             DDS_DynamicData *data)
00087 {
00088 
00089     data->set_string("hostname",
00090                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00091                      hostname_);
00092 
00093 
00094     sigar_proc_list_get(sig_,&proclist_);
00095   
00096     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < proclist_.number; i++) {
00097         
00098         //State
00099         sigar_proc_state_get(sig_,proclist_.data[i],&procstate_);
00100                 
00101         data->set_long("pid",
00102                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00103                        proclist_.data[i]);
00104         
00105         data->set_string("name",
00106                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00107                          procstate_.name);
00108 
00109         data->set_char("state",
00110                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00111                        procstate_.state);
00112 
00113         data->set_long("ppid",
00114                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00115                        procstate_.ppid);
00116 
00117         data->set_long("tty",
00118                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00119                        procstate_.tty);
00120 
00121         data->set_long("priority",
00122                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00123                        procstate_.priority);
00124         
00125         data->set_long("processor",
00126                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00127                        procstate_.processor);
00128 
00129         data->set_long("nice",
00130                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00131                        procstate_.nice);
00132         
00133         //Cred
00134         sigar_proc_cred_get(sig_,proclist_.data[i],&proccred_);
00135 
00136         data->set_long("uid",
00137                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00138                        proccred_.uid);
00139 
00140         data->set_long("gid",
00141                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00142                        proccred_.gid);
00143 
00144         data->set_long("euid",
00145                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00146                        proccred_.euid);
00147 
00148         data->set_long("egid",
00149                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00150                        proccred_.egid);
00151 
00152         //Cred name
00153         sigar_proc_cred_name_get(sig_,proclist_.data[i],&proccredname_);
00154         data->set_string("user",
00155                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00156                          proccredname_.user);
00157 
00158         data->set_string("group",
00159                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00160                          proccredname_.group);
00161                          
00162         
00163         //CPU
00164         sigar_proc_cpu_get(sig_,proclist_.data[i],&proccpu_);
00165 
00166         data->set_longlong("cpu_start_time",
00167                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00168                        proccpu_.start_time);
00169 
00170         data->set_long("cpu_user",
00171                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00172                        proccpu_.user);
00173         
00174         data->set_long("cpu_sys",
00175                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00176                        proccpu_.sys);
00177         
00178         data->set_long("cpu_total",
00179                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00180                        proccpu_.total);
00181         
00182         data->set_longlong("cpu_last_time",
00183                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00184                        proccpu_.last_time);
00185 
00186         data->set_double("cpu_percent",
00187                          DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00188                          proccpu_.percent*100.0);
00189 
00190         
00191         //Stat
00192         sigar_proc_mem_get(sig_,proclist_.data[i],&procmem_);
00193 
00194         data->set_long("mem_size",
00195                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00196                        procmem_.size/1024);
00197         
00198         data->set_long("mem_resident",
00199                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00200                        procmem_.resident/1024);
00201         
00202         data->set_long("mem_share",
00203                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00204                        procmem_.share/1024);
00205 
00206         data->set_long("mem_minor_faults",
00207                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00208                        procmem_.minor_faults);
00209 
00210         data->set_long("mem_major_faults",
00211                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00212                        procmem_.major_faults);
00213 
00214         data->set_long("mem_page_faults",
00215                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00216                        procmem_.page_faults);
00217 
00218 
00219         timestamp_ = time(NULL);
00220         data->set_long("ts",
00221                        DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00222                        timestamp_);
00223         
00224         if(!publish_information(writer, data))
00225             return false;
00226         
00227     }
00228 
00229     sigar_proc_list_destroy(sig_,&proclist_);
00230     return true;
00231     
00232 }
